title: What do we say to a Sion ulting away?

replies.body: I love it when I use his ult to run away with full health and then sion yells "COOOWWAAARRDSS"
I read the title and thought "It's Sion-ara isn't it?", I was not disappointed.

It's a little on the nose. You probably needed to be a little more circumspect in the title. Something like mentioning "an ulting Undead Juggernaut" and then lead into the Sion-ara.

It feels a little clunky to say Sion in the title when his name is part of the punchline.

Still funny though.
Did you really just evaluate a joke?
Well, it undercut the surprise, making it less funny then it could have been. So yes.

These bad puns are making me go In-{{champion:14}} 

*Sorry*
I am the terrible type of pun-bag of a human being that has said that to him in game.
Did you just get this from LilyPichus lazest Video/Stream? lul
